sourcesContent:
import styles from '../index.module.scss' const goods_list = [ { url: '../images/phone.jpeg', price: '7999', description: 'iPhone巅峰之作', title: 'iPhone13 Pro', id: 1, _key: 'phone' }, { url: '../images/mac.png', price: '9499', description: 'M2 芯片机型', title: 'MacBook Air', id: 2, _key: 'mac' }, { url: '../images/watch.jpeg', price: '2999', title: 'Apple Watch', description: '全天候视网膜显示屏', id: 3, _key: 'watch' }, { url: '../images/pods.png', price: '1399', title: 'AirPods', description: '第三代', id: 4, _key: 'pods' }, { url: '../images/pods-max.png', price: '4399', title: 'AirPods Max', description: '主动降噪与通透模式', id: 5, _key: 'pods_max' }, { url: '../images/mouse.jpeg', price: '699', description: '黑色多点触控表面', title: '妙控鼠标', id: 6, _key: 'mouse' }, { url: '../images/keyboard.jpeg', price: '899', description: '带有数字小键盘的妙控键盘', title: '妙控键盘', id: 7, _key: 'keyboard' }, { url: '../images/pad.png', price: '4399', description: '凭实力出彩', title: 'iPad Air', id: 8, _key: 'pad' } ] import { memo } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' const GoodList = memo(() => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleAddGood = (good) => { dispatch(add_good({...good})) } return (
{ goods_list.length > 0 && goods_list.map(good => (
{good.title}
{good.description}
{good.price}
)) }
) })
